name: css-counter-increment
description: Css module of single purpose classes for counter increment

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-counter-increment.css > css/css-counter-increment.css && tachyons src/css-counter-increment.css --minify > css/css-counter-increment.min.css && tachyons src/css-counter-increment.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
